sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button class="simulation-button">
    <router-link to="/sign-in">Go to simulation</router-link>
  </button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'SimulationButton',
  methods: {

  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>

a
.simulation-button {
  background-color: #417B5A;
  border: none;
  color: white;
  font-weight: bold;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  text-align: center;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 16px;
  margin: 4px 2px;
  cursor: pointer;
  border-radius: 8px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px #999;
}

.simulation-button:hover {background-color: #45a049}

.simulation-button:active {
  background-color: #45a049;
  box-shadow: 0 2px #666;
  transform: translateY(2px);
}
</style>
